PositiveSyncObject.@WaitTimelineSemThreadRace: Allocates 10000 transient device memory objects unnecessarily

@StageAccessExpansion-comment: TODO: Vulkan SC - This test fails to generate the appropriate sync hazard error
or report additional hazards than expected
Most likely a dependency on the SPIR-V code to be able to detect the right hazards

@disabled-excessive-objects: This test case uses too much stack space that could cause issues on QNX and creates
10000 descriptor sets which are well beyond the number of objects we reserve for
